originalText.text: Zola is incredibly talented. She is diligent, hardworking, and very ethical. I am so grateful for her leadership — she is a world class real estate agent! I cannot speak more highly about how she has been a joy to work with, and I will absolutely be working with her again. She truly cares for her clients.

originalText.text: Very knowledge about the new York market and what is best for her customers. Zola is the one who will help you find your best place as she helped me back in 2021. No non-sense is a competitive market. She puts in the hardwork to help you find your dream home. Hey Zola , I will be calling you whenever I am ready too move again. Stay at this! You have a gift !!

originalText.text: What can I say about Zola Abraham — a superstar, a beautiful person outside and inside (beautiful soul), she absolutely loves and treats her clients as if they were her own family, AND she will fight for the best for you! I have been fortunate enough to know her through the years and go through a lot of real estate ventures as her client and she has always seen me through! If you are needing to venture into buying, selling, and or rentals in the NY area, she is absolutely the one to do it with! So grateful for her professionalism, passion for the work, and client centered care.

originalText.text: Zola is one of the best agents I know! She puts all her efforts into her clients in making sure their needs are met. Never pushy and very patient. A kind person to boot! Definitely will refer!

text.text: Zola is one of the best agents I know! She puts all her efforts into her clients in making sure their needs are met. Never pushy and very patient. A kind person to boot! Definitely will refer!

originalText.text: Zola is an absolute gem in the city. I reached out to about three realtors before her and each one responded coldly or shortly saying "You don't need me because what's on the internet is what's available." If you have any experience in real estate you know this is not true. Zola is well knowledge, moves quickly, and truly takes your priorities into consideration. Outside of her professionalism she is KIND AND FUNNY! At the end of the day, you're looking for a place to be home and you shouldn't have to trade off a good attitude in the NYC market for that goal. 10/10 would recommend :)
